patterns.name: entity.name.class
patterns.match: \b(create account lookup response and populate fields|create swift payment and populate fields|create iso payment and populate fields|create profile action service request|create balance inquiry response|create account lookup response|create message submit request|create tasks service request|create fx getdeals response|register response parameter|create compliance response|create fx acclock response|create fx getrate response|create fx rejrate response|create fx vallock response|switch to default content|create fx rsstp response|register table parameter|close all child windows|create posting response|create advice response|create fedwire payment|create payment message|set string file values|wait for windows count|create fraud response|remove xml namespaces|select from combo box|add json file values|create swift payment|set json file values|set matching payment|invoke oracle query|set xml file values|confirm xml schema|create iso payment|create remote file|download resources|register parameter|submit mq message|get access token|navigate forward|read remote file|switch to window|wait for element|move to element|switch to alert|switch to frame|copy parameter|delete request|execute script|get mq message|get screenshot|close browser|context click|finastra ping|google search|hide keyboard|navigate back|patch request|read resource|sample action|try send keys|wait for page|close window|double click|geo location|kill process|post request|wait for url|create user|delete user|get request|submit form|upload file|long swipe|go to url|no action|send keys|try click|keyboard|refresh|scroll|click|swipe|wait)\b

patterns.name: entity.name.function
patterns.match: ((?<=\{)android ui automator(?=})|(?<=\{)android data matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)android view matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)windows automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ui automation(?=})|(?<=\{)partial link text(?=})|(?<=\{)accessibility id(?=})|(?<=\{)tizen automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ns predicate(?=})|(?<=\{)ios class chain(?=})|(?<=\{)response body(?=})|(?<=\{)css selector(?=})|(?<=\{)status code(?=})|(?<=\{)text length(?=})|(?<=\{)class name(?=})|(?<=\{)attribute(?=})|(?<=\{)link text(?=})|(?<=\{)selected(?=})|(?<=\{)tag name(?=})|(?<=\{)enabled(?=})|(?<=\{)visible(?=})|(?<=\{)binding(?=})|(?<=\{)driver(?=})|(?<=\{)exists(?=})|(?<=\{)x path(?=})|(?<=\{)count(?=})|(?<=\{)stale(?=})|(?<=\{)title(?=})|(?<=\{)image(?=})|(?<=\{)model(?=})|(?<=\{)date(?=})|(?<=\{)json(?=})|(?<=\{)text(?=})|(?<=\{)from(?=})|(?<=\{)name(?=})|(?<=\{)url(?=})|(?<=\{)xml(?=})|(?<=\{)id(?=}))
